name: Zaki Like Dislike Comments
author: Zaki Design

sections.description: This plugin implements a “like/dislike” rating system for comments. In the setting page you can choose a “compact / splitted” mode that show ratings like sum or separately.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload the plugin in your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag & Drop the widget in your sidebar and customize your options
sections.faq:
Will be provided for new features?

Yes! We are working for image customization and additional custom text for “like / dislike” button.
